title: Analysis of the Relationship Between Consumer Emotional Expression and Self-Construal

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Analyzing the impact of the relationship between emotional expression and self-construction on business, targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: Consumers can explain how their emotional expression styles are linked to self-construal types (independent/interdependent)
Through real-world cases, learners can analyze how the intensity of emotional expression impacts consumer decision-making
Based on learning content, learners can propose strategies for improving corporate communication
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
